title: Insilico Medicine and Qilu Pharmaceutical strike near‑$120M AI drug development deal
summary: Insilico Medicine, a clinical‑stage biotechnology company that uses generative artificial intelligence in drug discovery, and China’s Qilu Pharmaceutical Group have entered a strategic partnership valued at nearly $120 million to co‑develop novel small‑molecule therapies for cardiometabolic diseases, the companies said. The agreement leverages Insilico’s proprietary Pharma.AI platform to design and optimise drug candidates targeting specific metabolic […] The post Insilico Medicine and Qilu Pharmaceutical strike near‑$120M AI drug development deal appeared first on Longevity.Technology.
